_source.short_desc: The most human-friendly social media tool for an effective collaboration and approval process in marketing teams.
_source.long_desc: Kontentino enables advertising agencies and their clients to seamlessly collaborate when creating and approving social media content/ads. The quality of content improves and mistakes/fails are avoided. With Kontentino, you and your team save 40% of the time that would be spent on operational tasks. Moreover, the analytics section puts data in context so social media managers are able to better understand the performance of the posts/ads when reporting to clients.
_source.pricing_details:
14-day free trial, no credit card required.

Starter: €49/month - up to 3 user, up to 10 social media profiles.
Standard: starts at €99/month - up to 10 users, up to 40 social media profiles.
Pro: starts at €199/month - up to 10 users, with unlimited social media profiles and all modules included


Tailored Enterprise plans are also available.
_source.target_audience: Social media teams who create social media content for brands and businesses.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
related_products.features: HubSpot makes it easy for businesses to start doing social media marketing that actually generates business. You can also monitor your social media marketing efforts with baked-in analytics, so you can continually improve your content and start generating more leads for your business. Sign up for free, and see how HubSpot can help you do social media marketing that converts leads, closes customers, and contributes to your business.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Social media marketing solution that helps businesses create personalized marketing plans based on targeted audience and budget.
related_products.features: Social media marketing solution that helps businesses create personalized marketing plans based on targeted audience and budget.

related_products.short_desc: Connect any or all of your Facebook, Instagram, Google My Business or LinkedIn accounts, and begin scheduling your posts.
related_products.features: Streamline your social media. Finally, the answer to keeping your brand active and engaged on social media without requiring so much time and effort.

related_products.short_desc: PicMonkey offers cloud-based photo editing and design tools that help your create stunning images that tell your brand story.
related_products.features: PicMonkey's design and photo editing tools help you create captivating images to promote your brand. Get stunning results with luxe templates for logos, social posts, ads, banners, and more, or start from scratch and add design building blocks. When your business grows, PicMonkey grows with you; PicMonkey Business offers tools like brand kits, collaboration tools, and asset management to increase your output and keep your brand look consistent. Accessible as a cloud-based site and a mobile app.

related_products.short_desc: Complete social media marketing tool for agencies and teams of all sizes. Read why Capterra reviewers love Agorapulse.
related_products.features:
Agorapulse is a social media marketing tool that enables agencies, businesses and marketers to manage all their social media messages, schedule and publish content, identify key influencers, monitor social channels, and get stunning reports all in one easy-to-use dashboard. 

Agency customers receive special benefits in our Agency Love program.

Agorapulse currently supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn.

related_products.short_desc: ContentStudio is a data-driven content marketing and social media tool that allows you to discover, compose and share engaging content.
related_products.features:
ContentStudio is a multi-use social media management and content marketing tool that allows you to discover, compose and share the best content. It has a suite of products for content discovery, publishing, planning, analytics and automation to help marketing teams work and collaborate efficiently.

It is the perfect tool for discovering trending content, managing multiple social media networks, recycling evergreen posts, analyzing performance, collaborating with the team and a lot more.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
related_products.features: Marketo Engage has unique audience data on high-value prospects and customers, such as an engagement or lead score, buyer journey stage, product or topic interests, products owned, cross-channel activity, and more. It also lets you send lists of your best prospects or customers to social media platforms, which can identify similar people. And once you drive targeted prospects to your website and landing pages, you can retarget these anonymous visitors with personalized ads after they leave.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free social brand management and social CRM software used by over 8 million businesses. Cloud, mobile, open source editions
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is #1 free social brand management and social CRM software used by over 8 million businesses. Bitrix24 CRM works with Facebook (pages, comments, Facebook Messenger, Facebook lead ads), Viber, Instagram, Telegram, VK, Slack, Skype and many others, natively or via Microsoft Bot Framework. Bitrix24 Open Channels let you manage all your social communications from a single place, saving conversations to Bitrix24 CRM, regardless of which social network or messenger your client used.

similar_products.short_desc: Build customer relationships for life with data-first digital marketing.
similar_products.features: Meet Salesforce Social Studio. Listen, engage, and publish using a powerful all-in-one social media marketing and management suite and connect enriched social data to your marketing with sales and service. Analyze conversations from nearly any source to see what your industry and fans are saying. Respond to social posts, manage your community, and provide customer support. Create and approve content for multiple social networks and accounts from desktop or mobile.

similar_products.short_desc: The fastest and easiest way to create a successful Employee Advocacy program.
similar_products.features: SocialHP is enterprise grade Employee Advocacy software for marketing professionals. Our "never login" philosophy means there's no software for your team to learn and no need for ongoing training. Locked calendars are the secret to our 100% adoption and retention rates. Stage marketing-ready social media content on behalf of your entire team. We think our 99.9% all-time customer renewal rate speaks for itself. Chat with one of our Experts today.

similar_products.short_desc: Emplifi Social Marketing Cloud is the AI-powered end-to-end social platform that helps you manage all your tasks in one place.
similar_products.features: Emplifi Social Marketing Cloud provides a single, centralized solution for all your efforts to understand and drive customers' engagement on social media. Emplifi's industry-leading AI-powered tools, automation, and real-time insights improve the entire process of social media content creation and management. The results include faster conversions, instant brand discovery, and more effective performance tracking, so marketers like you can continually optimize your campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: AI tool to discover and analyze influencers, marketing campaigns on Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and uncover competitors strategy.
similar_products.features: HypeAuditor is a SaaS company that has developed a comprehensive set of tools to discover influencers on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter, and Twitch, verify the authenticity of their accounts, and track the results of their influencer marketing campaigns. All services are based on AI algorithms, allowing HypeAuditor to identify behavioral patterns. HypeAuditor aims to provide the ultimate social media analytics and management platform to ensure our clients work effectively with creators.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one social media marketing solution for social listening, publishing, reporting, benchmarking & engagement.
similar_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) provides a comprehensive, all-in-one Social Media Marketing solution. It's a one-stop solution for any marketer's social listening, publishing, engagement, measurement, and benchmarking needs. Brandwatch helps marketers deliver more personalized brand experiences across all digital touchpoints, based on enriched customer profiles. The solution features a highly intuitive and collaborative UI and is complemented by the best support team in the business.

similar_products.short_desc: Bazaarvoice's social media marketing software helps brands and retailers turn any social channel into a shoppable storefront.
similar_products.features: Bazaarvoice's social media marketing software allows brands and retailers to create shoppable posts and optimize social feeds for product discovery. Our suite of tools lets you create beautiful galleries on your website and turn any social channel into a shoppable storefront.

similar_products.short_desc: Instagram-first social media scheduler with link in bio tool, automatic story scheduling, grid planner, collaboration tools.
similar_products.features:
Sked Social is an Instagram-first social media scheduler. With a link-in-bio tool, automatic story scheduling, grid planner, and people, place, and product tagging, Sked has your Instagram scheduling sorted.

You can also cross-post your Instagram content to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, YouTube, Google My Business, TikTok and Snapchat - all from the same place.

And if you need external and internal reviews, you can upgrade to get collaboration features.

similar_products.short_desc: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure.
similar_products.features: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure. Streamline teamwork along your entire content management process: manage digital assets, fuel storytelling, polish content, approve messaging, reach your audience, engage your community and measure performance. Now supporting organic content, boosted posts and objective-driven campaigns. All in one collaborative solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
similar_products.features: Marketo Engage has unique audience data on high-value prospects and customers, such as an engagement or lead score, buyer journey stage, product or topic interests, products owned, cross-channel activity, and more. It also lets you send lists of your best prospects or customers to social media platforms, which can identify similar people. And once you drive targeted prospects to your website and landing pages, you can retarget these anonymous visitors with personalized ads after they leave.

similar_products.short_desc: Clearview Social is a simple platform that helps your team share company content on their social media platforms
similar_products.features:
Clearview Social is a simple platform that helps your team share company content on their social media platforms, all through easy prompts and email reminders.

Empowering your team to share helps you to achieve your companies' goals on social media, whether that's sales leads, webinar registrations, clicks or recruiting. 

Posts shared by employees get 8x+ more engagement than only posting to your company page. Clearview Social makes it dead simple to turn your employees into influencers.

similar_products.short_desc: A centralized platform for multi-location marketers to reach and engage their local customers, across 100s or 1000s of local pages.
similar_products.features: SOCi is an award-winning localized marketing platform built specifically for multi-location marketers. Our customers include top brands and influencers like Ace Hardware, Sport Clips, and Anytime Fitness who have the impossible challenge of managing their digital presence across hundreds and thousands of locations. As central command for multi-location marketers, SOCi makes the impossible possible by enabling top brands and their locations to strengthen and scale their digital presence.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud Campaign is the easiest way for social media agencies to manage multiple brands at scale. Low-cost and packed with features.
similar_products.features:
Cloud Campaign is the easiest way for marketing agencies to manage multiple social media accounts at scale, packed with enterprise features such as brand workspaces, taggable content library, client-access portals, clean client reports and white-label services.

No other social media management platform compares to our affordability and usability, backed by our top-rated US-based customer support team.

Start your FREE 14-day trial to see firsthand how you could spend up to 80% less time on SMM.

similar_products.short_desc: Social media SaaS platform for franchises combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy.
similar_products.features: Rallio is a powerful SaaS platform combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy. As the supplier of choice for franchise organizations and small businesses, Rallio enables multi-location brands and SMB operators to optimize their social media engagement, while managing their entire social media presence, online reputation, and online directory listings in one dashboard for all locations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top All-in-One Marketing Platforms on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of All-in-One Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: All-in-One Marketing Platforms provide multiple digital marketing tools for SMBs as part of one comprehensive package. Products offer marketing automation, campaign management, email and social marketing, lead management, landing pages/web forms, dynamic content, and various other marketing features.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reputation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reputation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reputation Management software helps organizations keep on top of what is being said about the organization and their products in various blogs, social networks, and media. Analytical capabilities of Reputation Management software allow marketing departments to measure and evaluate consumers' reactions to marketing campaigns and help companies better plan their future outreach. Reputation Management software is related to Brand Management software and Social Networking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Media Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Media Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Businesses use Social Media Management software to track, publish, and update content on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Pinterest, and other social media outlets.

related_products.short_desc: Improve social strategy with a powerful social media analytics and reporting suite | Try Sprout Free For 30 Days.
related_products.features: Sprout Social offers powerful social media analytics and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands including Hyatt, Ogilvy, Leo Burnett, Evernote and Microsoft. Sprout enables brands to simplify social analysis, benchmark competitors, track hashtags, gauge customer engagement and much more | Try Sprout Free For 30 Days.

related_products.short_desc: Smart, automated social media and messenger marketing platform that allows you to create, schedule and promote content.
related_products.features:
Contenive employs the whole social media management cycle, revealing not just effective content production, but also competitive field analysis, contextual network planning, placement, and analysis of outcomes.
Contenive is a proprietary solution that combines artificial and live intelligence to guarantee the high-quality generation (of visual and textual material) as well as instant posting with little client input.

related_products.short_desc: Build customer relationships for life with data-first digital marketing
related_products.features: Meet Salesforce Marketing Cloud, the leading marketing solution to increase engagement with every consumer. Use powerful data management to collect, organize, and securely store first-, second-, and third-party data alongside offline data to create complete consumer data profiles. Tailor every interaction along the journey with your brand using built-in AI. Then, engage each individual consumer at scale using industry-leading email, mobile, advertising, and social solutions.

related_products.short_desc: Social listening is only the first step. Mention helps to manage social media publishing to build stronger communities online.
related_products.features: Mention changes the way businesses manage their online presence. Our social listening platform instantly monitors important conversations from millions of sources across the web and social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, and TikTok to deliver insights that truly make an impact.

related_products.short_desc: Using the eclincher social media management tool helps businesses & agencies get things done on social and grow their brand reach.
related_products.features: At the nucleus of your digital marketing strategy eclincher catapults your brand reach, boosts your social media ROI, saves hours daily, increases your productivity, & expands your business across all channels. Because we are constantly innovating our product & services, you won't have to sacrifice features or capabilities, while keeping your budget top of mind. Our award-winning team offers 24/7 support & live demos. Improve your social media presence, broaden your reach, & add real value!

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one social media management solution for social listening, analytics, publishing, and engagement.
related_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) provides a unified solution for social media analytics and monitoring. It's a one stop shop for any marketer's social listening, measuring, benchmarking, and reporting needs. Falcon helps marketers to break free from spreadsheets, streamline workflows and power their decisions with data. This platform features a highly intuitive and collaborative UI and is complemented by the best support team in the business.

related_products.short_desc: VBOUT is a lead generation and marketing automation platform to automate and centralize marketing campaigns.
related_products.features:
VBOUT is a lead generation and marketing automation platform trusted by 1000's of businesses agencies to automate and centralize their marketing while delivering intelligent, personalized experiences to their audiences. 

Features include social media management, landing page builder, email marketing, automation builder, lead management and marketing analytics. 

Annual or monthly payment plans are 1/4 the cost of competing marketing automation solutions. 

Free premium support is included.

related_products.short_desc: With this social media analytics tool, you can track keyword performance, mentions, social media reach, and sentiment analysis.
related_products.features: Brand24 is a social media analytics tool that monitors and analyzes websites and social media across multiple channels. You can monitor keywords related to your business and determine how they are performing on social media channels in terms of social media reach, engagement, number of mentions, or influential sources listing them.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one social media management solution for social listening, analytics, publishing, and engagement.
similar_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) provides a unified solution for social media analytics and monitoring. It's a one stop shop for any marketer's social listening, measuring, benchmarking, and reporting needs. Falcon helps marketers to break free from spreadsheets, streamline workflows and power their decisions with data. This platform features a highly intuitive and collaborative UI and is complemented by the best support team in the business.

similar_products.short_desc: The end-to-end Social Marketing Cloud for the modern marketer and enterprises. Featuring best-in-class analytics & dashboard UI.
similar_products.features: Emplifi Social Marketing Cloud is an end-to-end Social Marketing Platform for modern enterprises that provides a single, centralized solution for all your efforts to understand and drive customers' engagement on social media. Leverage real-time intelligence, a centralized workspace for multi-channel management, and powerful analytics and reporting. Get the superpowers every marketer needs to convert your followers to customers - all in one platform.

similar_products.short_desc: AgencyAnalytics is a powerful social media reporting platform built specifically for marketing agencies.
similar_products.features:
The days of manually collecting data, taking screenshots, and poring over spreadsheets are long gone. 

Marketing agencies love our easy social media reporting tool. Connect all your clients' social channels and generate beautiful, automated reports your clients will love in just minutes. 

Monitor clicks, shares, comments, and more across all of today's most popular social media platforms and give your clients access to live 24-7 dashboards. Try it free for 13 days, no credit card required!

similar_products.short_desc: AI tool to discover and analyze influencers, marketing campaigns on Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and uncover competitors strategy.
similar_products.features: HypeAuditor is a SaaS company that has developed a comprehensive set of tools to discover influencers on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter, and Twitch, verify the authenticity of their accounts, and track the results of their influencer marketing campaigns. All services are based on AI algorithms, allowing HypeAuditor to identify behavioral patterns. HypeAuditor aims to provide the ultimate social media analytics and management platform to ensure our clients work effectively with creators.

similar_products.short_desc: Up your social media game with Supermetrics' streamlined marketing data pipeline. Used by +700k marketers in over 120 countries.
similar_products.features:
With Supermetrics, marketers can pull data from various social media platforms, such as Facebook, Twitter, and TikTok, into their go-to analytics and reporting tools.

Get your marketing data without the chaos and easily keep track of your social media activities and campaign performance with our customizable templates. Always refreshed and up-to-date.

+700k marketers in over 120 countries use Supermetrics to up their social media game.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete social media management tool for agencies and teams of all sizes. Read why Capterra reviewers love Agorapulse.
similar_products.features:
Agorapulse is a social media management tool that enables agencies, businesses and marketers to manage all their social media messages, schedule and publish content, identify key influencers, monitor social channels, and get stunning reports all in one easy-to-use dashboard. 

Agency customers receive special benefits in our Agency Love program.

Agorapulse currently supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn.

similar_products.short_desc: Put consumer segmentation and cultural insights at the center of your strategy.
similar_products.features:
Audiense identifies and understands any audience, no matter how specific or unique it is. Effortlessly create reports using filter options such as user profiles, affinities, demographics and job roles, creating highly personalised audience segments. 
What are we trying to solve?
- Time-consuming, static & expensive traditional consumer research 
- Social data to become a part of the strategy
- Brand strategy & personalisation have become very tactical at the expense of performance marketing

similar_products.short_desc: SmarterQueue is an intelligent social media scheduling tool.
similar_products.features:
SmarterQueue is an intelligent social media scheduling tool that empowers marketers, content creators, and entrepreneurs with the technology and capabilities they need to grow their businesses and careers. 

SmarterQueue's intelligent social media scheduler enables scheduling automation powered by queues and queue posting plans, content categories, evergreen recycling, visual calendars, and content variations.

It also includes advanced analytics, a social inbox, and content curation.

similar_products.short_desc: A media monitoring and social listening tool that boasts real-time global coverage, advanced brand analytics, and market insights.
similar_products.features:
Find out how people feel about your brand or product in no time.

- Never miss another mention of your company on any social media
- Always know how the public perceives your brand or competitors
- Make better decisions quicker
- Track even on the go with our mobile app

similar_products.short_desc: Highly accurate and smart, YouScan helps brands to listen to social media and get visual insights to make data-backed decisions.
similar_products.features:
YouScan is a social media analytics tool powered by image recognition technology. It provides instant access to customer conversations happening online, enabling enterprises and agencies to listen, analyze and turn social data into action. Sentiment analysis, trends detection and smart alerts combined with an intuitive and powerful dashboard allow users seamlessly fulfill the most complex tasks.
YouScan is efficiently used by major brands, including L'Oreal, Nestle, Coca-Cola, and McDonald's.

similar_products.short_desc: Social media SaaS platform for franchises combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy.
similar_products.features: Rallio is a powerful SaaS platform combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy. As the supplier of choice for franchise organizations and small businesses, Rallio enables multi-location brands and SMB operators to optimize their social media engagement, while managing their entire social media presence, online reputation, and online directory listings in one dashboard for all locations.

similar_products.short_desc: With this social media analytics tool, you can track keyword performance, mentions, social media reach, and sentiment analysis.
similar_products.features: Brand24 is a social media analytics tool that monitors and analyzes websites and social media across multiple channels. You can monitor keywords related to your business and determine how they are performing on social media channels in terms of social media reach, engagement, number of mentions, or influential sources listing them.

similar_products.short_desc: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data and integrate metrics where needed.
similar_products.features: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data from popular advertising, social media, email, shopping, CRM, and other platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Microsoft Ads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Mailchimp, Amazon, Shopify, and more, then integrate the metrics they need into their favorite data destinations, including Google Data Studio, Google Analytics, Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, Google BigQuery, and/or SQL.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Marketing software automates the processes of creating, publishing, and tracking the ROI of content-related marketing campaigns. Common functionality of these solutions includes workflow management, collaborative editing, scheduled publishing, SEO analytics, and social integration.

related_categories.description: Social Media Marketing software automates the creation, tracking, and management of online campaigns through social sites such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc. This software helps with publishing coupons and promotions and collecting customer response metrics.Social Media Marketing platforms offer integrated email that could be linked to multiple accounts in any of the social networks thus creating a single, go-to place for several simultaneous campaigns. Social Media Marketing software is closely related to Social Monitoring software and many solutions offer both capabilities in one package. For related software see also Campaign Management software.
